author: topix.com
title: Simon Helberg's fatherly dreams for The Big Bang Theory's Howard - Messenger Newspapers
text:
There are 1 comment on the Messenger Newspapers story from 4 hrs ago, titled Simon Helberg's fatherly dreams for The Big Bang Theory's Howard . In it, Messenger Newspapers reports that:
The Big Bang Theory star Simon Helberg has said he wants his screen alter-ego, Howard Wolowitz, to reunite with his estranged dad. The 34-year-old actor portrays the aerospace engineer in the award-winning comedy, alongside co-stars Kunal Nayyar, Jim Parsons and Johnny Galecki.
Join the discussion below, or Read more at Messenger Newspapers.
